name: bwch
description: BwCh is a JavaScript API to detect bandwidth for web-based environments.  It uses some of the latest JavaScript innovation (window.navigator.connection currently  supported in Chrome 48+ for Android as of April 2016) in order to provide a flexible method to detect bandwidth for both mobile and desktop  devices.  It fallbacks to image pre-loading to detect bandwidth where those newest API are not available.
author: Arnaud Leyder
